title: Advocate's Comments On ACA Now A Liability For Law's Supporters
teaser: Lawmakers grilled an MIT professor on Tuesday over controversial comments he made about Obamacare. Jon Gruber has been one of the law's strongest advocates, but he also said the law passed with a big assist from voters' "stupidity."
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
